title: Venice Vampires 4: An Erotic Paranormal Romance
description: After making peace with her brother, Emily finds herself on a plane with Luc headed for Venice. Despite Luc’s flirtatious exterior, Emily can see a hesitation in his eyes when she asks him for the details of the trip…VENICE VAMPIRES 4 is the fourth installment in the erotic short story romance series, VENICE VAMPIRES, by Emma Rose.
author: Emma  Rose
